data.name: en_cmd_goto_no_args
data.value: Scenes list: Inventory Farm Store Garden Market Tree

data.name: en_cmd_help_show_goto
data.value: Command "GOTO"(CD): GOTO Display all the scenes. GOTO <scene> Go to the specified scene. <scene>: The name or initials of a scene.

data.name: en_cmd_help_show_help
data.value: Command "HELP": HELP Display the help text. HELP <command> Display the syntax of a command. <command>: A command, use "LIST CMDS" to get commands those can be this argument.

data.name: en_cmd_help_show_lang
data.value: Command "LANG": LANG Display all available languages. LANG <index> Switch to the specified language. <index>: The index of a language.

data.name: en_cmd_help_show_list
data.value: Command "LIST"(LS): LIST Display all parameters of this command. LIST <list> Display the specified list. <list>: A list parameter.

data.name: en_cmd_help_show_load
data.value: Command "LOAD": LOAD <path> Read the save from the specified path. <path>: An absolute path strictly pointing to the "TerminalFarm.json" file.

data.name: en_cmd_help_show_page
data.value: Command "PAGE"(P | DIR): PAGE Display the current page of the current scene. PAGE <number> Switch to the specified page of the current scene. <number>: Page number.

data.name: en_cmd_help_show_save
data.value: Command "SAVE": SAVE Display the current save path. SAVE RESET Reset the save path to default. SAVE <path> Set custom save path. <path>: An absolute path to an existing directory.

data.name: en_cmd_help_show_swap
data.value: Command "SWAP"(S): SWAP Switch items without index number at the market and apple tree scenes. SWAP <index> Switch item from the specified slot of the current page of the current scene by index. <index>: Index number.

data.name: en_cmd_help_show_upgrade
data.value: Command "UPGRADE"(UPG): UPGRADE Upgrade the current scene.

data.name: en_cmd_help_show_use
data.value: Command "USE"(U): USE <index> Use item to the specified slot of the current page of the current scene by index. <index>: Index number.

data.name: en_cmd_help_text
data.value: How to play: There is only needing keyboards to play this game. To do actions, just type something and press enter to send them to the game like sending messages to people in chatting app. Try to send "LIST CMDS" to have a check all the commands you can use, and then you can use "HELP <A Command>" to get the useage about a command one of them. To switch languages, send "LANG" to get a list of all supported languages, and send "LANG <the number of one language>" to switch to it.

data.name: en_cmd_lang_invalid_language_index
data.value: "{0}" is not a valid language index.

data.name: en_cmd_lang_switch_to_current_lang
data.value: The display language has been switched to English.

data.name: en_cmd_list_no_args
data.value: Below are all available parameters: CMDS SCENES UPGRADES

data.name: en_cmd_list_show_cmds
data.value: Commands list: CLEAR EXIT GOTO HELP LANG LIST LOAD PAGE SAVE SELL SWAP USE

data.name: en_cmd_list_show_scenes
data.value: Scenes list: Inventory Farm Store Garden Market Tree

data.name: en_cmd_list_upgrades_intro_farm
data.value: Upgrade to extend the watering keeping time of the slots of Farm. The default is 18 hours, it'll extend for 3.6 hours (3h36m) per level, and the max level is 46.8 hours (1d22h48m).

data.name: en_cmd_list_upgrades_intro_garden
data.value: The garden upgrade will unlock after all other scenes are fully upgraded. After this upgrade, the pots will change from grey to white. The garden is used to place the flowers you have collected. Each pot holding a different colored flower means you have completed the collection, and the white pots indicate that you have fully upgraded all other scenes. This makes it easy for you to showcase your efforts with just one screenshot.

data.name: en_cmd_list_upgrades_intro_inventory
data.value: Upgrade to get more pages of Inventory, up to 5 pages.

data.name: en_cmd_list_upgrades_intro_market
data.value: Upgrade to additionally display tomorrow's market prices.

data.name: en_cmd_list_upgrades_intro_store
data.value: Upgrade to deduct the cost of manual restock. Default is 200, it'll reduct for 25 per level, the max level is 100.

data.name: en_cmd_list_upgrades_intro_tree
data.value: Upgrade to get more lines for collecting apple, up to 6 lines.

data.name: en_cmd_load_failed
data.value: Failed to read the save data from the specified custom save path.

data.value: Missing parameters. If you want to get the current save path please use "SAVE".

data.name: en_cmd_load_success
data.value: Successfully read the save data from the specified custom save path.

data.name: en_cmd_swap_garden_not_flower
data.value: The slots of Garden can only be empty or placed with flowers.

data.name: en_cmd_swap_hand_empty
data.value: The handing slot must not be empty when use this command during current scene.

data.value: The handing slot must be empty when use this command during current scene.

data.value: The index number is out of bound.

data.name: en_cmd_swap_not_a_number
data.value: The input parameters are not a number.

data.value: Current scene does not support this command with parameters.

data.name: en_cmd_swap_scene_need_arg
data.value: Current scene does not support this command without parameters, please retry with index number.

data.name: en_cmd_swap_shop_slot_empty
data.value: The slot of index "{0}" is empty.

data.name: en_cmd_swap_success_farm
data.value: Success to harvest the crop from index "{0}" of farm.

data.name: en_cmd_swap_success_garden
data.value: Success to swap item with index "{0}" of Garden.

data.name: en_cmd_swap_success_inventory
data.value: Success to swap item with page "{0}" index "{1}" of Inventory.

data.name: en_cmd_upgrade_garden_locked
data.value: The upgrade of Garden is locked. Please use "LIST UPGRADES" to check it.

data.value: The index number is out of bound.

data.name: en_cmd_use_item_cannot_use
data.value: The item current taked cannot be used.

data.name: en_cmd_use_not_a_number
data.value: The input parameters are not a number.

data.name: en_cmd_use_scene_is_not_farm
data.value: This command can only use in Farm.

data.name: en_custom_path_illegal
data.value: Failed to use the custom save path because it is not an absolute path or is illegal. Has fallen back to the default.

data.name: en_gamesave_null_error
data.value: Error. The save data in RAM is null, please try re-load save of re-open the game.

data.name: en_welcome
data.value: Welcome TerminalFarm BV-H{0}! ----BCASoft Type and send "HELP" to get start.

data.name: zh_cmd_goto_no_args
data.value: 场景列表: Inventory 仓库，用于放下物品 Farm 农田，在此种植作物种子并照料它们 Store 商店，可在此购买种子和工具 Garden 花园，摆放花朵作为收集品和展示游戏进度 Market 市场，查看市场价并出售物品 Tree 苹果树，会自动产出用于卖钱的苹果

data.name: zh_cmd_help_show_clear
data.value: 命令"CLEAR"(CLS): CLEAR 清空屏幕.

data.name: zh_cmd_help_show_exit
data.value: 命令"EXIT": EXIT 退出游戏.

data.name: zh_cmd_help_show_goto
data.value: 命令"GOTO"(CD): GOTO 显示所有场景. GOTO <scene> 前往指定场景. <scene>: 一个场景的名称或首字母.

data.name: zh_cmd_help_show_help
data.value: 命令"HELP": HELP 显示帮助信息. HELP <command> 显示一条命令的语法. <command>: 一条命令，可使用"LIST CMDS"获取可用作此参数的命令.

data.name: zh_cmd_help_show_lang
data.value: 命令"LANG": LANG 显示所有可用语言. LANG <index> 切换到指定语言. <index>: 一个语言的索引.

data.name: zh_cmd_help_show_list
data.value: 命令"LIST"(LS): LIST 显示所有列表参数. LIST <list> 显示指定列表. <list>: 一个列表参数(可以只填首字母).

data.name: zh_cmd_help_show_load
data.value: 命令"LOAD": LOAD <path> 从指定路径读取存档. <path>: 一个严格指向"TerminalFarm.json"文件的绝对路径.

data.name: zh_cmd_help_show_page
data.value: 命令"PAGE"(P | DIR): PAGE 显示当前场景的当前页面. PAGE <number> 切换至当前场景的指定页面. <number>: 页码.

data.name: zh_cmd_help_show_save
data.value: 命令"SAVE": SAVE 显示当前存档保存路径. SAVE RESET 重置存档保存路径为默认路径. SAVE <path> 设定自定义存档保存路径. <path>: 一个指向已存在目录的绝对路径.

data.name: zh_cmd_help_show_swap
data.value: 命令"SWAP"(S): SWAP 在市场和苹果树场景中不使用索引数交换物品. SWAP <index> 与当前场景的当前页面上由索引指定的格子交换物品. <index>: 索引序号.

data.name: zh_cmd_help_show_upgrade
data.value: 命令"UPGRADE"(UPG): UPGRADE 升级当前场景.

data.name: zh_cmd_help_show_use
data.value: 命令"USE"(U): USE <index> 将手持物品使用在当前场景的当前页面上由索引指定的格子. <index>: 索引序号.

data.name: zh_cmd_help_text
data.value: 如何游玩: 这个游戏只需要使用键盘. 只需要输入文本然后按回车发送给游戏就可以进行操作, 就像在聊天软件里给人发消息一样. 试着发送"LIST CMDS"来查看所有你能使用的命令, 然后你可以发送"HELP <命令>"来获取其中一条命令的用法. 想切换语言的话, 发送"LANG"以获得显示所有支持的语言的列表, 然后发送"LANG <一个语言的序号>"来切换到该语言.

data.name: zh_cmd_lang_switch_to_current_lang
data.value: 显示语言已切换至中文.

data.name: zh_cmd_list_no_args
data.value: 以下是可用的参数: CMDS SCENES UPGRADES

data.name: zh_cmd_list_show_cmds
data.value: 命令列表: CLEAR - 清空控制台屏幕 EXIT - 退出游戏 GOTO - 前往特定场景 HELP - 显示帮助或命令信息 LANG - 切换语言 LIST - 列出特定列表 LOAD - 读取存档 PAGE - 显示场景的指定页面 SAVE - 保存存档 SELL - 出售手持槽或场景中的物品 SWAP - 与格子交换物品 UPGRADE - 升级当前场景 USE - 对格子使用物品

data.name: zh_cmd_list_show_scenes
data.value: 场景列表: Inventory - 仓库，用于放下物品 Farm - 农田，在此种植作物种子并照料它们 Store - 商店，可在此购买种子和工具 Garden - 花园，摆放花朵作为收集品和展示游戏进度 Market - 市场，查看市场价并出售物品 Tree - 苹果树，会自动产出用于卖钱的苹果

data.name: zh_cmd_list_upgrades_intro_farm
data.value: 升级延长格子土壤保湿时间. 初始为18小时，每升一级可延长3.6小时(3小时36分钟)，满级为46.8小时(1天22小时48分钟).

data.name: zh_cmd_list_upgrades_intro_garden
data.value: 将其他所有场景都升满级后解锁花园的升级，升级后花盆会从灰色变成白色. 花园用于摆放作为收集品的花朵，每个花盆上花朵颜色各异意味着你达成了全收集，而白色的花盆意味着你已经把全部场景升级好了，方便你把你在终端农场中长久以来努力的证明集中在一张屏幕截图中.

data.name: zh_cmd_list_upgrades_intro_inventory
data.value: 升级获得仓库页数，最多可拥有5页.

data.name: zh_cmd_list_upgrades_intro_market
data.value: 升级后市场会额外显示明天的市场价格.

data.name: zh_cmd_list_upgrades_intro_store
data.value: 升级降低手动重新上架商品所需的费用. 初始为200，每升一级可降低25，满级为100.

data.name: zh_cmd_list_upgrades_intro_tree
data.value: 升级获得收集行数，最多可拥有6行.

data.name: zh_cmd_load_failed
data.value: 从指定的自定义存档路径读取存档失败.

data.name: zh_cmd_load_input_path_is_invalid
data.value: 输入不合法或不是绝对路径.

data.name: zh_cmd_load_not_save_path
data.value: 该路径指向不是一个"TerminalFarmSave.json"文件.

data.name: zh_cmd_load_no_args
data.value: 缺少参数。如果你想查看当前的保存路径请使用"SAVE".

data.name: zh_cmd_load_success
data.value: 成功从指定的自定义存档路径读取存档.

data.name: zh_cmd_page_out_of_bound
data.value: 指定的页码"{0}"超出场景范围.

data.name: zh_cmd_page_text
data.comment: 0=场景, 1=当前等级, 2=最高等级, 3=金钱数

data.name: zh_cmd_page_width_too_short
data.value: 控制台宽度过短，无法显示场景.

data.name: zh_cmd_save_display_the_save_path_using
data.value: 当前使用的存档路径为"{0}".

data.name: zh_cmd_save_input_path_is_invalid
data.value: 输入不合法或不是绝对路径.

data.name: zh_cmd_save_reset
data.value: 已重置存档路径为默认路径.

data.name: zh_cmd_save_success
data.value: 已设置自定义存档路径.

data.name: zh_cmd_save_target_folder_not_exist
data.value: 该路径指向不是一个已存在的目录.

data.name: zh_cmd_sell_hand_empty
data.value: 出售手持槽物品失败，因为手持槽为空.

data.name: zh_cmd_swap_garden_not_flower
data.value: 花园场景的格子只能留空或摆放花朵.

data.name: zh_cmd_swap_hand_empty
data.value: 当前场景使用此命令必须手持槽不为空.

data.name: zh_cmd_swap_hand_not_empty
data.value: 当前场景使用此命令必须手持槽为空.

data.name: zh_cmd_swap_scene_cannot_arg
data.value: 当前场景的此命令不可跟随参数.

data.name: zh_cmd_swap_scene_need_arg
data.value: 当前场景不支持不带参数使用此命令，请伴随索引序号使用.

data.name: zh_cmd_swap_scene_no_obj
data.value: 当前场景没有对象可用.

data.name: zh_cmd_swap_success_farm
data.value: 成功从农场索引"{0}"格子收获作物.

data.name: zh_cmd_swap_success_garden
data.value: 成功从花园索引"{0}"格子交换物品.

data.name: zh_cmd_swap_success_inventory
data.value: 成功从仓库第"{0}"页索引"{1}"格子交换物品.

data.name: zh_cmd_upgrade_garden_locked
data.value: 花园升级已锁定，请使用"LIST UPGRADES"查看.

data.name: zh_cmd_use_item_cannot_use
data.value: 当前持有的物品不可使用.

data.name: zh_cmd_use_scene_is_not_farm
data.value: 此命令仅可在农田中使用.

data.name: zh_custom_path_illegal
data.value: 无法使用自定义存档路径，其不是绝对路径或不合法，已回退到默认路径.

data.name: zh_gamesave_null_error
data.value: 发生错误，内存中存档数据为空类型，请尝试重新读取存档或重启游戏.

data.name: zh_welcome
data.value: 欢迎 终端农场 BV-H{0}! ——BCASoft 输入并发送"HELP"以启程.

data.name: _debug
data.value: Hello {0} This is a debug text for TerminalFarm.
